modules.description: Runs shell commands asynchronously, capturing exit status, stdout, and stderr. It supports timeout handling and provides functions to format process results, particularly for error reporting. Useful for executing external programs and managing their lifecycle in async workflows.

This module enables asynchronous execution of shell commands and remote file operations, supporting both local shell and SSH-based workflows. It provides stream-based processing of command output, with functions to capture exit status, stdout, stderr, and handle timeouts, while requiring explicit lifecycle management to prevent orphaned processes. Child modules extend this capability with utilities for formatting results and managing external program execution in async contexts. Example uses include remote server automation, distributed system interactions, and asynchronous task execution with partial output handling.
